The easiest way is to go into the Persistence File (make a backup) and go all the way down until you see CREW (It will be just before APPLICANTS) then just delete who you don't want anymore.

To get rid of Jeb, (Worthless Crew) Bill (Gravity Bacon) and Bob (The Faulty Fuse) build a ship to go to the Mun, land them there, then abandon them (Quarantine) the region. I think Jeb Bill and Bob are over played any way.

An RT-10 usually works pretty well.

But if you're after something less permanent, a Hitchhiker pod makes a decent orbital prison cell...

1) Make an engine pointing straight up

2) Have the Kerbal walk onto the engine (it's ok, you'll be perfectly fine!)

3) FIRE THE ENGINE

Why fire Kerbals when you can just kill them? You don't even need to "waste" a rocket for that. Just put a booster on the bottom of a command capsule, put parachutes on the booster / command capsule so you can recover it, and launch it. Just let the Kerbals EVA during the ascent and they die.

I feel bad for writing this. Kerbals are innocent. Don't kill them.
